information.name: backup-sync-dropbox
information.description: This plugin handles synchronization of your UNMS backups to a Dropbox folder.
information.author: Ubiquiti Inc.

configuration.label: UNMS API token
configuration.description: You can create UNMS API token in Network -> Settings -> Users.

configuration.label: Dropbox App key
configuration.description: You can get Dropbox App key in the Dropbox App console, see readme for more information.

configuration.label: Dropbox App secret
configuration.description: You can get Dropbox App secret in the Dropbox App console, see readme for more information.

configuration.label: Dropbox Access Code
configuration.description: After the plugin runs for the first time, you will get a setup URL in the plugin log. To finish setup, you must go to the URL, allow access to the application and enter the generated Access Code into this field.

configuration.label: Dropbox refresh token
configuration.description: Refresh token will be loaded automatically after you enter the Access Code and the execute the plugin. You don't need to provide it.

configuration.label: Dropbox access token (legacy)
configuration.description: Long-lived access tokens are deprecated and will stop working at some point. See readme for migration instructions.
